description: Whole grain bread is stuffed with veggies, creamy black olive hummus, and grilled up to crispy perfection in these vegan hummus panini sandwiches.
name: Grilled Mediterranean Black Olive Hummus Panini Sandwiches
recipeIngredient: 1 3/4 cups cooked or 1-14 oz. can chickpeas (drained and rinsed)
1 cup large California Black Ripe Olives
12 to 16 large California Ripe Black Olives (sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas, olive oil, lemon juice, tahini and vinegar into food processor and blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as needed.
Add parsley, California Black Ripe Olives, capers and black pepper to food processor bowl. Pulse just until finely chopped and incorporated into hummus. Transfer mixture to a bowl.
